Back to Johannes Brahms

Johannes Brahms

Circle Canon in A major, Anh. III/3

1856

This is a nine-bar circle canon. The canon modulates upwards by a major second; if this is repeated a further five times, the canon returns to A major. The instrumentation is unspecified, but is effective for solo piano.

Duration: 1'

Difficulty: 1.5
